properties.Name: ProductBillOfMaterial
properties.Description: The Bill Of Material (BOM) used to create the product. The BOM lists the items (materials) that are part of the product.

Columns.Name: ProductId
Columns.Description: The unique identifier of a Product.

Columns.Name: BomLevelNumber
Columns.Description: The Bill of Material level for the associated Item/BOM components.

Columns.Name: ItemSku
Columns.Description: The Stock Keeping Unit identifier, which is typically used for inventory-related activities.

Columns.Name: ItemInstallationSequence
Columns.Description: The Bill Of Material installation sequence of the associated Item.

Columns.Name: BomQuantity
Columns.Description: The quantity of Items associated with the BOM Level.

Columns.Name: EngineeringSpecificationNumber
Columns.Description: The Engineering Specification Number that addresses the associated BOM/Item Level.

Columns.Name: UnitOfMeasureId
Columns.Description: The unique identifier of a Unit Of Measure.

Columns.Name: Note
Columns.Description: A note, comment or additional detail regarding the BOM component.
